SELECT c.name,c.ByMemberId,a.type,a.time,b.time as Ontime,b.state FROM R_DEVICE_INFOR b,R_ALARM a,R_DEVICE c WHERE a.DeviceId=b.deviceinforID and b.bydeviceID=c.deviceID limit #{s},#{e}

select c.`Name`,a.x,a.y from (select * from ( select * from r_device_infor order by Time desc limit 100000 ) as t GROUP BY t.ByDeviceId) as a,r_device as b,r_member c WHERE a.bydeviceId=b.DeviceId AND b.ByMemberId=c.MemberId
